data.name: Viscera Cleanup Detail - Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The Viscera Cleanup Detail Soundtrack includes all the music from the in-game 'Big Banger' radio device. Unlike in-game however, the Soundtrack here is in stereo format! What a concept!
Music from Viscera Cleanup Detail, House of Horror, The Vulcan Affair and Santa's Rampage are included. All songs are in 320kbps MP3 format.
All files will be stored under: "..steamapps/common/Viscera/Soundtrack"

Tracklist

  • 01: Jungle Jazz - Bongo in the Congo
  • 02: The Escalator Crew - Squeaky Clean
  • 03: Biohazardous Waste Leak - Goo
  • 04: The Zoologists - Monkeyfire
  • 05: Dirty Razors - Shrieker
  • 06: Red Pill - Spaced Out
  • 07: Cobbled Hoppers - Polka 2180
  • 08: Strung Out Orchestra - The Ballad of Rick Rodney; Space-Pirate
  • 09: Skunks in the Machine - Chemical Roach
  • 10: Zero Boy - Karoshi Ghost
  • 11: Janitor Nation - Cleanup Menu
  • 12: Janitor Nation - Darkwash
  • 13: Wormhole - Boom!
  • 14: The Catalyst vs Cosmic Voodoo - PowahPlant
  • 15: Syzygy Twins - Neutronium Sandwich
  • S01: Santa's Ruin - Workshop Cleanup
  • S02: Santa's Ruin - March of the Elves
  • S03: Santa's Ruin - Whiskey and a Shotgun
  • S04: Santa's Ruin - Red Snow
  • S05: Santa's Ruin - Ghost of Christmas SLASHED!
  • H01: Bloated Corpse - Grave of Maggots
  • H02: Undead & Unfed - Zombie Horde
  • H03: Crusher - Bonesong
  • H04: Thunderbird - The Final Destination
  • H05: Scream Team - It Came From the Pumpkin Patch
  • H06: Ed Gallows - Hell's Bell's
  • V01: Tuxedos & Torpedoes - The D# is for Danger
  • V02: Gilded Digits - Oil Drums
  • V03: Atomic Bonds - Water Re-Tension
  • V04: Hyperspeeder - Running Man
  • V05: White Cat - Shaken. Stirred. Blended. Consumed
  • V06: Zipline - Spy in the Ointment
  • V07: Well Orchestrated - String Theory
  • V08: Thresher - Master of the Rodents

*Note: All tracks were created by Arn Richert of RuneStorm. All artist names are intended to be fictional.*

data.short_description: The VCD Soundtrack includes all the tunes from the game's radio. Also includes the set from Santa's Rampage and House of Horror.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win XP SP3, Win 7
  • Processor: 2.4GHz Dual core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB Shader Model 3.0 Nvidia GeForce 8800 GT or AMD Radeon HD 3870
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Win XP SP3, Win 7
  • Processor: 2.6GHz Quad core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 560 or AMD Radeon HD 585
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
